title: Daily quotes for inspiration
summary: Motivational and inspirational words on your homescreen!
developerAddress: Россия, Москвоская обл. г. Фрязино, Спортивный проезд 2а-19.
description: Motivational and inspirational words on your homescreen! Add widgets with famous phrases, quotes about life and love, words of wisdom right to your screen to stay in a good mood.  Average person checks smartphone dozens of times during a day. With our widget such gazes will bring inspiration and positive thoughts. Set unique style and refresh period to personalize widgets and fit them to home screen's wallpaper.  Also, the widget can be used as notes on your home screen. Add your own thoughts and messages as reminding about something important (unlock via in­app purchase).
descriptionHTML:
Motivational and inspirational words on your homescreen! Add widgets with famous phrases, quotes about life and love, words of wisdom right to your screen to stay in a good mood.

Average person checks smartphone dozens of times during a day. With our widget such gazes will bring inspiration and positive thoughts.
Set unique style and refresh period to personalize widgets and fit them to home screen's wallpaper.

Also, the widget can be used as notes on your home screen. Add your own thoughts and messages as reminding about something important (unlock via in­app purchase).
recentChanges: - Now we download the phrases from backend - it means that you have unlimited positive quotes without any updates!
